comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Typo in title, most like Gouda, not Gonda. Gouda is a city in the Netherlands en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gouda

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Yes, definitely Gouda. This photo is used to illustrate a story on conditions of the refugee camp at Gouda in the June 26, 1915 issue of The Survey: books.google.com/books?id=yvoqAAAAMAAJ&pg=PA286&l... The photo credit is "Courtesy, Rockefeller Foundation".

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Yes you are correct.  It's a typo.  We will correct the title.
